nodes.bodyText: How about we print out the actual values of the arguments here?
Should we support multi-value column as well? If not, can we add some description on this class?

This function expects the arguments to be boolean, internal implementation is loosen to numerical value. Multi-value doesn't have too much meaning here, e.g.  we can expect argument to be a=10 or b in (1,2,3) to be either 1 or 0.
